programme.title: 1989 in review
programme.short_synopsis: A review of the major news stories of 1989, including revolutions and invasions.
programme.medium_synopsis: A review of the events of 1989, including the revolutions in Poland, Czechoslovakia, Hungary and Romania, the invasion of Panama, and Soviet-Chinese summits.
